title: Cloudflare Global Outage Spreads to Crypto; Multiple Front Ends Down
contentSnippet: A widespread Cloudflare outage disrupted major parts of the internet on Tuesday, knocking many crypto platforms offline.

title: Bonds Hint at Rebound: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Nov. 18, 2025

title: Crypto Markets Today: Fear Grips Market as BTC Tests Support, Volatility Spikes
contentSnippet: Bitcoin hovered near $91,000 as sentiment hit "extreme fear," volatility jumped and leveraged traders absorbed over $1 billion in liquidations while altcoins fell further.

title: Bitcoin Correction Mirrors April Drop as 2025 Buyers Fall Into the Red
contentSnippet: Market drawdown pushes bitcoin below 2025 key cost basis levels.

title: Mastercard taps Polygon to turn clunky crypto addresses into simple usernames
contentSnippet: Mastercard is rolling out verified, human-readable crypto aliases to self-custody wallets, using Polygon for onchain support and Mercuryo for identity verification.

title: Bitcoin Drops to Seven-Month Low Under $90K
contentSnippet: Bitcoin ETFs have bled hundreds of millions as the market outlook deteriorates, driven by profit-taking and portfolio rebalancing.

title: Libra token-linked wallets pull $4M and bet big on Solana
contentSnippet: Wallets tied to the Libra token continue to draw liquidity and have purchased $61.5 million in Solana, despite asset freezes and fraud probes.

title: Deutsche Börse to Add SocGen’s MiCA Stablecoins to Core Market Systems
contentSnippet: Move brings regulated euro and dollar stablecoins into Deutsche Börse’s settlement and collateral tools.

title: Grab deepens stablecoin push with StraitsX Web3 wallet and settlements
contentSnippet: Southeast Asian super app Grab’s MOU with StraitsX shifts its Web3 efforts from pilots to infrastructure, exploring a unified stablecoin settlement layer across Asia.

title: ARK Invest scoops $10M in Bullish as it hits record low amid crypto stock rout
contentSnippet: Crypto stocks plunged on Monday, with Coinbase, Marathon Digital, Riot, CleanSpark, Circle and Strategy all sliding sharply.

title: Record $1.26B Outflow Hits BlackRock Bitcoin ETF as Bearish Options Cost Soars
contentSnippet: The price of IBIT has dropped 16% to $52, a level last seen in April.

title: トランプ一族、世界初のトークン化ホテル開発プロジェクト参画を発表
contentSnippet: トランプ・オーガニゼーションとDAR Globalが世界初のトークン化ホテル開発をモルディブで発表。ブロックチェーン技術を活用した新たな不動産投資モデルとして注目される。

title: Mt. Gox moves $953M Bitcoin after 8 months, sparking market worries
contentSnippet: Mt. Gox just moved 10,608 BTC worth $953 million, its first big transfer in months, as $4 billion in creditor repayments stay delayed until October 2026.

title: Aave、米国で高利回り貯蓄アプリ「Aave App」開始へ　銀行入金・残高保護に対応
contentSnippet: DeFi大手Aaveが一般ユーザー向け貯蓄アプリ「Aave App」を米国で提供開始予定。最大100万ドルの残高保護、自動積立機能など、従来の銀行預金（平均0.4%）を上回る利便性を提供する。

title: Mastercard Picks Polygon to Bring Verified Usernames to Self-Custody Wallets
contentSnippet: Move introduces verified aliases for crypto transfers and adds an ID layer to self-custody tools.

title: Bitcoin Dominance Is Bleeding With Price, but Market Observers Say Altcoin Season Is on Hold
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s drawdown, alongside cross-pair stability and steady on-chain activity, points to a market clearing excess leverage rather than shifting into a high-beta altcoin run.

title: 金商法移行で暗号資産市場はどう変わる？　JVCEA小田会長が業界の懸念に回答｜独自取材
contentSnippet: 暗号資産の金商法移行が最終局面を迎える中、日本暗号資産取引業協会(JVCEA)の小田玄紀代表理事がCoinPostの独自取材に応じた。開示規制は分散性の高い銘柄を対象外とし、取扱銘柄の大幅減少は想定されていないと明言。規制の枠組みを理解した上での革新を呼びかけた。分離課税実現には金商法移行が必要条件の一つであり、多くの政党が前向きに検討していると認識を示した。

title: Average Bitcoin ETF investor now underwater as BTC falls below $89.6K
contentSnippet: Bitcoin and Ether ETFs saw another day of heavy withdrawals, while Solana ETFs maintained an uninterrupted inflow streak since launch.

title: El Salvador Buys 1,090 BTC as Prices Drop and IMF Pressure Mounts
contentSnippet: The country has added nearly 100 million dollars to the national bitcoin treasury as BTC trades below $90k.

title: マウントゴックス、ビットコイン1万BTCを動かす　弁済に進展か
contentSnippet: 破綻した暗号資産取引所マウントゴックスが11月18日、約1万608BTC（約1,470億円相当）を移動した。過去の大規模移動が債権者返済に先立って実施されてきた経緯から、今回も返済準備の可能性が指摘されている。同社は2024年7月から返済を開始しており、現在も約3万4,689BTCが未配布となっている。

title: Dogecoin Eyes Rebound After Multi-Year Trendline Break Tests $0.15 Floor
contentSnippet: The memecoin's technical structure is weakened, with key support at $0.1520 needing to hold to prevent further declines.

title: SEC makes no specific mention of crypto in 2026 exam priorities
contentSnippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission’s latest examination priorities document didn’t mention crypto as an area of focus for the coming year, unlike in previous years.

title: Efforts underway to digitize trade in Africa with blockchain, stablecoins
contentSnippet: Chido Munyati, head of Africa at the World Economic Forum, said in a statement that outdated payments and documents are a significant obstacle for African trade, one that he hopes digitization can sol

title: 暗号学者アダム・バック、ビットコインの現実的な量子リスクは最短でも20年後　「備えは十分可能」
contentSnippet: 暗号学者アダム・バック氏が量子コンピュータによる脅威について「20-40年は安全」との見解を示した。一方、専門家の間では5-10年以内のリスクを指摘する声もある。

title: Bitcoin miner HIVE shares boost 7.5% on record quarterly revenue
contentSnippet: HIVE Digital has reported record revenues for its latest quarter, spurred by rising Bitcoin prices and an expansion of its mining fleet.

title: Bitcoin whales switch to buying amid ‘extreme fear’
contentSnippet: On-chain data reveals the number of Bitcoin whales have been increasing since the start of October.

title: エルサルバドル、下落局面で約155億円相当のビットコイン押し目買い　保有高は7474BTC
contentSnippet: エルサルバドル政府が市場下落局面で約155億円相当のビットコインを追加購入し、保有高は7474BTCに達した。2025年1月に法定通貨地位を撤廃したものの、ブケレ政権は戦略的準備資産としての蓄積を継続している。

title: ヴィタリック、イーサリアムのプライバシー保護ツール「Kohaku」を紹介
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨イーサリアムのブテリン共同創設者がプライバシー保護ツール「Kohaku」を新たに紹介した。Railgun連携やゼロ知識証明で匿名性を強化する開発ロードマップを解説する。

title: CZ氏、6650億円の罰金返還なら米国に再投資と言及
contentSnippet: バイナンス創業者CZ氏が米司法省への約6650億円の罰金返還時に米国再投資を表明。トランプ大統領からの恩赦後、民主党議員からの腐敗疑惑批判に対し、感謝と慎重さのバランスを強調した発言として注目される。

title: Two Technical Signals Hinting at a Bitcoin Bear Market
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's bear market outlook firms as 80% of key on-chain metrics flash red, with derivatives and options traders betting on more downside.

title: TD Cowen Says Strategy's Bitcoin-Buying Engine Remains Intact Despite Market Volatility
contentSnippet: TD Cowen kept its $535 target, citing strong preferred-share demand and rising Bitcoin per share despite a narrowing NAV premium.

title: 伝説投資家ドラッケンミラー、ブロックチェーン融資企業フィギュアの株式を120億円相当取得
contentSnippet: フィギュア株価上昇米ウォール街の伝説的なヘッジファンドマネージャーであるスタンリー・ドラッケンミラー氏が運営するデュケイン・キャピタルは11月15日、第3四半期の13F報告書で、ブロックチェーン融資企業フィギュア・テクノロジー・ソリューショ...

title: ソラナ保有企業フォワード、367億円相当SOLをコインベースへ入金　警戒高まる
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ソラナを財務資産として保有するナスダック上場のフォワード・インダストリーズが約367億円相当のSOLをコインベース・プライムに移動させた。売却か社内再編成かは不明だ。

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Dive Deeper Amid AI and Macro Angst
contentSnippet: Bitcoin dropped to its lowest level in six months. Ethereum dipped below $3,000, its lowest point since mid summer.

title: Google Unveils New AI Weather Model With Faster, More Accurate Forecasts
contentSnippet: Google WeatherNext 2 AI-powered Forecasts now support Search, Gemini, Pixel Weather, and Maps weather tools.

title: Survey of AI Founders Predicts Perplexity is the AI Giant Most Likely to Fail
contentSnippet: Perplexity’s growing stack of lawsuits and scraping allegations added fuel to the skepticism voiced by founders and investors last week.

title: Bitcoin Miner Hive's Stock Rises After Record Q2 Revenue, AI Deal
contentSnippet: Hive Digital Technologies began rebounding Monday after an earnings win and Dell deal to power the Bitcoin miner’s growing AI ambitions.

title: Ethereum Is the Opposite of Sam Bankman-Fried's FTX, Says Vitalik Buterin
contentSnippet: Ethereum is decentralized, "can’t be evil," and is a community—everything that FTX wasn’t, ETH founder Vitalik Buterin said Monday.

title: Bitcoin Treasury KindlyMD Extends Stock Collapse After Earnings Delay
contentSnippet: KindlyMD shares dropped another 10% after missing its Q3 earnings deadline, with the company citing merger accounting complexity and warning of major losses ahead.

title: Grayscale Poised to Debut Dogecoin ETF as VanEck's Solana Fund Starts Trading
contentSnippet: A Grayscale ETF tracking popular meme coin Dogecoin could list next next week, while a VanEck Solana fund debuted Monday.
